amendment.description: To modify the multiyear procurement authority for C-17 aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2477 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 8. Record Vote Number: 317.

action.text: Amendment SA 2477 proposed by Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S12586-12589; text: CR S12586) To modify the multiyear procurement authority for C-17 aircraft.
